short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the background color of the current page to green, red, yellow, or blue

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the color of the background of the page being viewed. From the options, the color of the new background can be selected. The colors available are green, red, yellow, and blue. If you don't like a background color, you can change it easily, or if you're taking a screenshot, you can have a brighter background than normal.
